articles.title: South African "Facebook Rapist" caught in Tanzania after police manhunt - CBS News
articles.description: Thabo Bester faked his own death in a prison break and was on the lam before police discovered the ruse.
articles.content:
A South African fugitive who faked his own death in a prison break that embarrassed authorities has been apprehended in Tanzania, the government said on Saturday.
